sentences.english: People in the high-incidence area gastric nitrosamine compounds were significantly lower than the district.
sentences.chinese: 高發區人胃液中亞硝胺類化合物含量明顯高於低發區。

sentences.english: These nitrosamines have been shown to cause cancer in laboratory animals.
sentences.chinese: 這些亞硝胺被證實會對試驗室的動物致癌。

sentences.english: N-Nitrosamine can be formed in vivo by the interaction of nitrites with secondary amines .
sentences.chinese: 亞硝胺可由其前體物質亞硝酸鹽及二級胺在體內合成。

sentences.english: Some specific nitrosamines can cause animals to esophageal cancer.
sentences.chinese: 一些亞硝胺能特異地引起動物食管癌。

sentences.english: It was established a method to detect the migration of nitrosamines from nature latex gloves for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 首次建立了乳膠手套中亞硝胺遷移量的檢測方法。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effects of tobacco-specific nitrosamines (TSNA) and nicotine on hamster cheek pouch and gastric mucosa.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究菸草特異性亞硝胺對地鼠頰囊粘膜的作用。

sentences.english: Mold and carcinogenic nitrosamines a synergistic effect.
sentences.chinese: 黴菌與亞硝胺有協同致癌作用。
